code: import'./App.css';import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[routeDuJour,setRouteDuJour]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{getRouteJour();},[]);function getRouteJour(){Axios.get("http://172.20.45.21:8080/serviceREST-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT/routeDuJour").then(response=>{setRouteDuJour(response.data);});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Voici les routes pour la journee"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:routeDuJour})]});}export default App;
